0.000000 MPH

<1>

Deposit plain stablecoins or tokens - DAI/USDC/USDT/TUSD/BUSD/sUSD/LINK/YFI - which will get converted underneath to cTokens for compound pools, aTokens for aave pools or xyzTokens for others pools.

<2>

After depositing in the pool, you receive liquidity provider (LP) tokens. They represent your share of ownership in the pool.

<3>

By providing liquidity on any of the 88mph pools, you earn MPH LP reward tokens during the fixed-period of lending.

<4>

By staking your MPH, you can claim your share of rewards from the 88mph's reward pool where all the 88mph fee and external incentives harvested - COMP, CRV, etc. - are collected.

<5>

When your lending period is over, you withdraw your principal with the fixed-rate interest earned during the period of lending.

How much would you like to stake?

If you stake your MPH, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: 88mph fees, and incentives like governance tokens or LP rewards harvested by the 88mph pools on external protocols (COMP, CRV, etc).

Fill up 88mph deposits' deficit to earn the variable APY generated by those deposits & claim MPH tokens.

E.g. Chad fills up a deficit of 5 tokens related to Kevin's deposit of 100 tokens on which a 5% fixed-rate APY was offered. Chad will earn a variable APY on 105 tokens and some $MPH until Kevin withdraws his assets.

Chad is longing the interest rate and will receive his variable rate interests automatically when Kevin will withdraw his assets. The best part is that Chad will still be in profit even if the variable rate drops by 25% compared to the one at the time of Kevin's deposit. See how it works.
